title_narrative: Support to UNDP-China for facilitating South-South Cooperation on renewable energy technology transfer from China to Ghana and Zambia
description_narrative: The overall development objective is enhanced capacity for South-South development cooperation between China and countries in Africa (i.a. Ghana and Zambia) within renewable energy technology transfer to be developed and tested. The specific objective for the Ghana component is to contribute to climate change mitigation and reduced poverty by increasing access to renewable energy solutions through enhanced investment and production of renewable energy technologies in Ghana within the framework of South-South cooperation between Ghana and China. The specific objective for the Zambia component is to improve energy access and living conditions in rural Zambia through South-South cooperation by promoting electrification of rural communities in Zambia and to strenghten China's capacity for South-South cooperation.
contact_info_mailing_address_narrative: Royal Danish Embassy, 1 Dong Wu Jie, San Li Tun
